about_me: I’m a maker. I’m constantly tinkering, building, or fixing things - from mobile apps to combustion engines. I’m motivated by challenging work and excited about solving real problems.

I live and work in Brooklyn, where I lead engineers on an innovative team within Walmart. I used to live in Seattle, where I helped found a digital health startup, called Pillsy. I'm originally from Indianapolis and I graduated from the University of Michigan.
I love to meet new people and explore new places. In my free time I enjoy being outdoors, especially in the mountains or on the water.
aspiration: To build technologies that help make people happier and healthier.
